summary: Chen-Ning Franklin Yang , also known as Yang Zhenning, is a Chinese-born American physicist and mathematician.
full_text: The Bogoliubov Prize is an international award offered by the Joint Institute for Nuclear Research  to scientists with outstanding contribution to theoretical physics and applied mathematics. The award is issued in the memory of the theoretical physicist and mathematician Nikolay Bogoliubov.
title: Bogolyubov Prize
